traits.name: Chameleon
traits.desc: As a bonus action, a demon can alter its coloration to blend with its surroundings. This grants the demon advantage on Stealth checks.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The demon’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The demon’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10, +2 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: fear, darkness, detect evil and good, see invisibility

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/turn)
traits.desc: The demon deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the demon that isn’t incapacitated and the demon doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The demon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
